704730f-a.title: Brooklyn: Halleck Street - Smith Street
704730f-a.text:
Halleck Street, north side, between Smith Street and Gowanus Canal.
The buildings at the right, are the Bowne Merton Stores, at 6ll Smith Street.
In the background on 13th Street, are the Brooklyn Union Gas Co. Tanks.
In the extreme left, is the overhead lines of the Eighth Ave. Subway.
October 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
